channel.title: [Release]ParaBot ~ the best rsps bot![Near reality, Inception & More]
channel.description:
[size=6]Parabot[/size] [size=3]Parabot is a fully free to use bot for runescape private servers. We currently support 7 different servers! We currently have built some scripts in the bot so you can start botting right away![/size]
[size=16pt]Bot made by Clisprail![/size]
[i][size=3][u]Images[/u][/size][/i]
[img]http://parabot.org/scripts/images/bot1.png[/img] [img]http://parabot.org/scripts/images/bot2.png[/img]
[i][u]Scripts[/u][/i]
Our team has made some awesome scripts that you can use! You can select them from our interactive script selector. Java developers and even beginners can make powerful scripts too with our easy to use API! A few tutorials will be posted in the tutorial section. You can check it our scripts *
[i][u]Docs[/u][/i]
If you want to script for our bot check out the javadocs to see our easy to use API. The docs are available *
If you have got any question please ask them!
[u][i]Video[/i][/u]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SI3aiCkH55w&feature=player_embedded]ParaBot - Near Reality Bot - 2012 - Working - YouTube[/url]
[u][i]Download[/i][/u]
* If you think this might be a virus or do not trust this, don't use it, I'm not forcing you to use it.
Happy botting.
[size=24pt][i][b]FisherPro[/b][/i][/size]
[size=14pt](Alpha 2)[/size]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/szajk7.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Alpha 2 ran flawlessly for 2h 30 mins and could run even longer! Please post your proggys![/size]
(Alpha)
[ul][*]Supports banking + powerfishing [*]Easy and understandable gui [*]Supports Shrimp, Lobsters, Sharks and Manta/Sea Turtle[/ul]
[size=14pt](Bugs)[/size]
[ul][*]Manta/Sea Turtle is extremely buggy, will also be fixed in next alpha! [*]Walking is a bit buggy, will probably be fixed by the client devs.[/ul]
[size=14pt](Upcoming)[/size]
[ul][*]Rocktail fishing on the donor island on Near-reality. [*]Fix bugs that causes the script to not work properly.[/ul]
[size=14pt](Updates)[/size]
[ul][*]Fixed the bot from stopping to missclick the bank. [*]Fixed the bug where the bot doesn't find the spot.[/ul]
[center][size=14pt]Instructions[/size]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/6nv821.jpg[/img] [color="Red"] [size=24pt]Please, report any bugs found to this thread.[/size]
[size=18pt]Credits: Alohha & Clisprail for this amazing script![/size]

item.title: [Release]ParaBot ~ the best rsps bot![Near reality, Inception & More]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

A bot for a RSPS? Cool, but why don’t you create a simple script that loops using SCAR? It’s not like these private servers have random events.

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Meh… it’s whatever floats people’s boats, I could care less if a person bots on a RSPS. Nonetheless, this seems to be training only ONE skill which is the most easiest on a RSPS (some anyway), this wouldn’t be all that helpful.

[size=6]Parabot[/size]
[size=3]Parabot is a fully free to use bot for runescape private servers. We currently support 7 different servers! We currently have built some scripts in the bot so you can start botting right away![/size]
